metadata.title: Dabung Women's Lauren Solid Color Stunning Pashmina Wrap Shawl
features: * Soft, reliably warm & pristinely woven from the finest Pashmina & Silk.
* Plush, stylish & excellently crafted - will keep you warm and looking fabulous.
* Versatile - shawl, wrap, scarfCan be worn year-round and perfect for all occasions.
description: This finely woven Pashmina Shawl will keep you warm and looking incredibly polished whatever the occasion. The natural qualities of the Pashmina provide warmth, softness and durability while also adding elegance and beauty. Expertly woven with only the finest Pashmina , this Pashmina Shawl can be used all year and for any occasion. Due to the amazing versatility & practicality of this Pashmina Shawl, anytime is a good time - day and night, while traveling and at home, formal events and casual outings, as a wrap, shawl and scarf. A timeless, must-have piece that you can always carry with you. 80" length x 28" width. Fringed ends. Imported. Dry Clean.
